synopsis.text: After a hard-fought victory against a scheming TV show director, the Binan High School Earth Defense Club, also known as the Battle Lovers, are back to their leisurely high school lives. With their newfound peace, they spend their days lounging in the local bathhouse, Kurotama. However, their tranquility is disrupted when their Loveracelets start to activate, signaling a new threat. As autumn sets in, the arrival of two mysterious students at Binan High School hints at a fresh wave of challenges. Will these newcomers join the Battle Lovers in their quest to defend Earth, or will they bring more chaos? The love-filled journey is far from over! Prepare to witness the magical boys transform and protect the planet with the power of love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
